cms.query.QueryText: SELECT * FROM COM_ExchangeTable WHERE (((ExchangeTableValidFrom <= @CurrentDate) OR (ExchangeTableValidFrom IS NULL)) AND ((ExchangeTableValidTo >= @CurrentDate) OR (ExchangeTableValidTo IS NULL))) AND ISNULL(ExchangeTableSiteID, 0) = @SiteID ORDER BY ExchangeTableValidFrom DESC, CASE WHEN ExchangeTableValidTo IS NULL THEN 2 ELSE 1 END, ExchangeTableValidTo
